reviewText: It is a very good set and was informative even if a little dated.

This was purchased so that we could watch, as a family, about Ancient Civilizations.  The item description sounded great, however, there was so much content in just the first DVD that we watched that we were not expecting nor wanting to see.  As an example, quite a bit of time was spent on underground sex cults and their entrance rituals which was not appropriate for our family.
